content:
The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umerov thanked the German colleague of Boris Pistorius for the announcement of a new package of military assistance for Ukraine for 500 million euros.

About this head of the defense departmentwroteThe Twitter Twitter.

“The package includes ammunition from the Bundeswehr stocks, Czech initiative and industry contracts. By demonstrating solidarity in the face of cruel aggression, we provide future peace and stability in Europe, ”his post reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, within the meeting of the contact group on support of Ukraine on a military base in Ramstyna, Germany's Defense Minister Boris PistoriusannouncedA new military assistance package to Ukraine worth 500 million euros.
title: Rustem Umerov thanked Germany for a new military assistance package
